name: iit-ism-clubs
description: This is the website for IIT (ISM) Gymkhana

scripts.imagemin: imagemin img/* -o dist/img && imagemin clubslink/images/* -o dist/clubslink/images && imagemin clubslink/images1/* -o dist/clubslink/images1/
scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin calendar.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/calendar.html && usemin eventsnew.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/eventsnew.html && usemin faq.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/faq.html && usemin k.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/k.html && usemin clubs/adc.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/adc.html && usemin clubs/lci.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/lci.html && usemin clubs/foto.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/foto.html && usemin clubs/art.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/art.html && usemin clubs/litc.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/litc.html && usemin clubs/litm.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/litm.html && usemin clubs/chayan.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/chayan.html && usemin clubs/cyber.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/cyber.html&& usemin clubs/manthan.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/manthan.html && usemin clubs/robo.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/robo.html && usemin clubs/mechismu.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/mechismu.html && usemin clubs/toast.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/toast.html && usemin clubs/wtc.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/wtc.html && usemin clubslink/LITERARY.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubslink/LITERARY.html && usemin clubslink/CULTURAL.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubslink/CULTURAL.html && usemin clubslink/PHOTO.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubslink/PHOTO.html && usemin clubslink/astro.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubslink/astro.html && usemin clubs/e_cell.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/e_cell.html && usemin clubs/book.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubs/book.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin

author: cjchirag7
